Quotes.title: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Quotes.author: Steve Jobs

Quotes.title: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
Quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

Quotes.title: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
Quotes.author: Confucius

Quotes.title: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
Quotes.author: Steve Jobs

Quotes.title: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
Quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

Quotes.title: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
Quotes.author: Winston Churchill

Quotes.title: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
Quotes.author: Sam Levenson

Quotes.title: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
Quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

Quotes.title: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
Quotes.author: Walt Disney

Quotes.title: If you are working on something that you really care about, you don't have to be pushed. The vision pulls you.
Quotes.author: Steve Jobs

Quotes.title: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
Quotes.author: Anonymous

Quotes.title: Dream big and dare to fail.
Quotes.author: Norman Vaughan

Quotes.title: Your talent determines what you can do. Your motivation determines how much you're willing to do. Your attitude determines how well you do it.
Quotes.author: Lou Holtz

Quotes.title: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
Quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Quotes.title: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
Quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

Quotes.title: The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
Quotes.author: Anonymous

Quotes.title: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
Quotes.author: Winston Churchill

Quotes.title: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
Quotes.author: Joshua J. Marine

Quotes.title: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
Quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

Quotes.title: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
Quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

Quotes.title: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
Quotes.author: Mark Twain

Quotes.title: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.
Quotes.author: Walt Disney

Quotes.title: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
Quotes.author: Will Rogers

Quotes.title: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
Quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

Quotes.title: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
Quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

Quotes.title: Nothing will work unless you do.
Quotes.author: Maya Angelou

Quotes.title: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.
Quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

Quotes.title: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
Quotes.author: Chris Grosser

Quotes.title: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
Quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

Quotes.title: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
Quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

Quotes.title: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
Quotes.author: Peter Drucker

Quotes.title: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
Quotes.author: Winston Churchill

Quotes.title: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
Quotes.author: Lao Tzu

Quotes.title: When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.
Quotes.author: Carol Burnett

Quotes.title: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.
Quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

Quotes.title: The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me.
Quotes.author: Ayn Rand

Quotes.title: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
Quotes.author: George Addair

Quotes.title: What you lack in talent can be made up with desire, hustle and giving 110% all the time.
Quotes.author: Don Zimmer

Quotes.title: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
Quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

Quotes.title: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.
Quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

Quotes.title: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
Quotes.author: John Lennon

Quotes.title: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
Quotes.author: Henry Ford

Quotes.title: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
Quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

Quotes.title: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
Quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

Quotes.title: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
Quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

Quotes.title: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
Quotes.author: Babe Ruth

Quotes.title: If you really look closely, most overnight successes took a long time.
Quotes.author: Steve Jobs

Quotes.title: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
Quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

Quotes.title: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
Quotes.author: Jim Ryun

Quotes.title: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
Quotes.author: Charles Kingsleigh

Quotes.title: Believe in yourself. You are braver than you think, more talented than you know, and capable of more than you imagine.
Quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

Quotes.title: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
Quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

Quotes.title: If you're offered a seat on a rocket ship, don't ask what seat! Just get on.
Quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

Quotes.title: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
Quotes.author: Tony Robbins

Quotes.title: It always seems impossible until it's done.
Quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

Quotes.title: Keep your face always toward the sunshine, and shadows will fall behind you.
Quotes.author: Walt Whitman

Quotes.title: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do.
Quotes.author: Mark Twain

Quotes.title: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
Quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

Quotes.title: Only the paranoid survive.
Quotes.author: Andy Grove

Quotes.title: It's hard to beat a person who never gives up.
Quotes.author: Babe Ruth

Quotes.title: I wake up every morning and think to myself, 'How far can I push this company in the next 24 hours?'
Quotes.author: Leah Busque

Quotes.title: We need to accept that we won't always make the right decisions, that we'll screw up royally sometimes – understanding that failure is not the opposite of success, it's part of success.
Quotes.author: Arianna Huffington

Quotes.title: Write it. Shoot it. Publish it. Crochet it, sauté it, whatever. MAKE.
Quotes.author: Joss Whedon

Quotes.title: You can never cross the ocean until you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.
Quotes.author: Christopher Columbus

Quotes.title: Do what you can, where you are, with what you have.
Quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

Quotes.title: If people are doubting how far you can go, go so far that you can't hear them anymore.
Quotes.author: Michele Ruiz

Quotes.title: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
Quotes.author: Maya Angelou

Quotes.title: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Wishing is not enough; we must do.
Quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

Quotes.title: Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you're right.
Quotes.author: Henry Ford

Quotes.title: I alone cannot change the world, but I can cast a stone across the water to create many ripples.
Quotes.author: Mother Teresa

Quotes.title: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.
Quotes.author: John Wooden

Quotes.title: If you want to achieve greatness stop asking for permission.
Quotes.author: Anonymous

Quotes.title: If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
Quotes.author: Jim Rohn

Quotes.title: Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow. The important thing is not to stop questioning.
Quotes.author: Albert Einstein

Quotes.title: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
Quotes.author: Albert Einstein

Quotes.title: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
Quotes.author: Bruce Lee

Quotes.title: If you want to make a permanent change, stop focusing on the size of your problems and start focusing on the size of you!
Quotes.author: T. Harv Eker

Quotes.title: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
Quotes.author: Dalai Lama

Quotes.title: Don't let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
Quotes.author: John Wooden

Quotes.title: You can't use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
Quotes.author: Maya Angelou

Quotes.title: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
Quotes.author: George Eliot

Quotes.title: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
Quotes.author: Buddha

Quotes.title: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
Quotes.author: Les Brown

Quotes.title: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
Quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

Quotes.title: If you don't design your own life plan, chances are you'll fall into someone else's plan. And guess what they have planned for you? Not much.
Quotes.author: Jim Rohn

Quotes.title: Either you run the day, or the day runs you.
Quotes.author: Jim Rohn

Quotes.title: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
Quotes.author: Mark Twain

Quotes.title: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
Quotes.author: Jimmy Johnson

Quotes.title: Life is not about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
Quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

Quotes.title: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.
Quotes.author: Lao Tzu

Quotes.title: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
Quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

Quotes.title: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
Quotes.author: Albert Einstein

Quotes.title: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
Quotes.author: Florence Nightingale

Quotes.title: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don't have any.
Quotes.author: Alice Walker

Quotes.title: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
Quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

Quotes.title: Build your own dreams, or someone else will hire you to build theirs.
Quotes.author: Farrah Gray

Quotes.title: What we fear doing most is usually what we most need to do.
Quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

Quotes.title: You become what you believe.
Quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

Quotes.title: The key is to keep company only with people who uplift you, whose presence calls forth your best.
Quotes.author: Epictetus

Quotes.title: If you want to achieve excellence, you can get there today. As of this second, quit doing less-than-excellent work.
Quotes.author: Thomas J. Watson

Quotes.title: The greatest discovery of all time is that a person can change their future by merely changing their attitude.
Quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey
